description:
Eiichiro has become known as the player who takes notes during matches as he spends every day playing tennis. However, he continues to struggle to win matches as his rivals are clearly well above him. After some deliberation, Eiichiro increases the time he spends running and weight building. Time passes and Eiichiro is now a second-year. It will soon be time for the Kanagawa Junior Circuit again.
Source: crunchyroll
